The application was made first to the Fund for the Advancement of Adult
Education because Sf their wellknown interest in television. It was
transferred by them to the Fund for the Advancement of Education because
they did not feel that elementary and secondary education came within the
compass of adult education.
Anything you can do to help spur this Fund into action will be deeply
appreciated. It was a pleasure to have dinner with you the other night.
I hope you enjoyed your show. JThe Rockettes performed beautifully, as
usual, in a Christmas theme. Perhaps I shall see you at East Lansing
next month.
With kindest regards.
Belmont Farley, Director
Press and Radio Relations
